name: rewrap
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to wrap something again: Rewrap the dough in plastic wrap and refrigerate for another 90 minutes. I sometimes re-wrap unwanted gifts and pass them on the following Christmas.
More examplesFewer examplesHe jumped up, rewrapped the scarf around his head, and slipped on his plastic sandals. The packages were rewrapped and delivered, and when they were picked up, the recipients were arrested. She re-wrapped the tape on her swollen foot before starting the workout.
